name: ActionGroup
label: action group
definition: classifier that differentiates corporate actions based on a GLEIF specific grouping

name: BREAKUP
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions in which a single company splits into two or more independent, separately-run companies
label: BREAKUP

name: TRANSFORMATION_SUBSIDIARY_TO_BRANCH
label: TRANSFORMATION_SUBSIDIARY_TO_BRANCH
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving the transfer of all of the assets and liabilities of a subsidiary to an International Branch entity in exchange for the transfer of securities representing the capital of the International Branch entity receiving the transfer

name: MERGERS_AND_ACQUISITIONS
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions in which a single company splits into two or more independent, separately-run companies
label: MERGERS_AND_ACQUISITIONS

name: ABSORPTION
label: ABSORPTION
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions that is a kind of merger where there is a combination of two or more companies into an existing company

name: CHANGE_LEGAL_ADDRESS
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a notification of a change in the legal address of the legal entity
label: CHANGE_LEGAL_ADDRESS

name: StandaloneGroup
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions that are single, standalone events rather than a combination of multiple events
label: standalone group

name: ComplexLegalFormGroup
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a more complex legal entity event including change of the legal entity status triggered by change of the legal form
label: complex legal form group

name: ReverseTakeoverGroup
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions that are part of a reverse takeover event
label: reverse takeover group

name: LegalFormNameGroup
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a change in the legal form, name, or other information such as an address change for an organization
label: legal form and name group

name: TRANSFORMATION_UMBRELLA_TO_STANDALONE
label: TRANSFORMATION_UMBRELLA_TO_STANDALONE
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a notification of a change in the legal form from a Fund legal entity structure with one or more than one sub-funds/compartments to a Fund legal entity structure without sub-funds/compartments

name: GLEIF-CorporateActionClassificationScheme
definition: scheme for classifying corporate actions according to the GLEIF LEI Common Data Format (CDF) schema
label: GLEIF corporate action classification scheme

name: SPINOFF
label: SPINOFF
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions where the shareholders of the original entity are compensated for the value loss of the original entity via shares of the new entity or via dividend

name: BANKRUPTCY
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions in which the status of a legal entity is that it is unable to pay creditors
label: BANKRUPTCY

name: DISSOLUTION
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving (i) A voluntary termination of operations, (ii) a general assignment for the benefit of the legal entity's creditors or (iii) any other liquidation, dissolution or winding up of the legal entity (excluding a Liquidity Event), whether voluntary or involuntary (event completed)
label: DISSOLUTION

name: VOLUNTARY_ARRANGEMENT
label: VOLUNTARY_ARRANGEMENT
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions consisting of a procedure that allows a legal entity to settle debts by paying only a proportion of the amount that it owes to creditors or to come to some other arrangement with its creditors over the payment of its debts (event completed)

name: CHANGE_OTHER_NAMES
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a notification of a change in the trade- or doing business name of the legal entity
label: CHANGE_OTHER_NAMES

name: TRANSFORMATION_BRANCH_TO_SUBSIDIARY
label: TRANSFORMATION_BRANCH_TO_SUBSIDIARY
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving the transfer of all of the assets and liabilities of an International Branch to the new subsidiary entity in exchange for the transfer of securities representing the capital of the subsidiary entity receiving the transfer

name: ACQUISITION_BRANCH
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions where the acquiring legal entity purchases an international branch entity
label: ACQUISITION_BRANCH

name: DEMERGER
label: DEMERGER
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a distribution of securities issued by another legal entity

name: LIQUIDATION
label: LIQUIDATION
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions consisting of distribution of cash, assets, or both

name: CHANGE_LEGAL_NAME
label: CHANGE_LEGAL_NAME
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a notification of a change in the legal name of the legal entity

name: CHANGE_LEGAL_FORM
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a notification of a change in the legal form of the legal entity
label: CHANGE_LEGAL_FORM

name: INSOLVENCY
label: INSOLVENCY
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving the entry of a decree or order by a court or agency or supervisory authority having jurisdiction in the premises the appointment of a trustee-in-bankruptcy or similar official for such party in any insolvency, readjustment of debt, marshalling of assets and liabilities, or similar proceedings, or for the winding up or liquidation of their respective affairs (event completed)

name: CHANGE_HQ_ADDRESS
label: CHANGE_HQ_ADDRESS
definition: GLEIF classifier for corporate actions involving a notification of a change in the headquarters address of the legal entity
